features.name: GitSync
features.body: Plastic SCM now speaks the Git network protocol so it is possible to directly push and pull from a remote Git server, including GitHub.

features.name: Item merge tracking
features.body: Diff a branch or a changeset, show the 2D-file history or annotate a file and find how merges are better explained.

features.name: Semantic History
features.body: 90% of the time when you check a file’s history, you are only looking for a specific method. Semantic History parses the code and tracks the element you’re looking for

features.name: Client changelists
features.body: A way to organize in groups the checkouts on the ‘pending changes view’.

features.name: Visual Studio 2013
features.body: Tightly integrated with the newest release of Visual Studio, including the new color schemes.

features.name: Improved Eclipse support
features.body: New built-in Branch Explorer, performance improvements, new queries on views and lots of small tweaks.

features.name: New path based security
features.body: Now you can assign ACLs to paths so you can easily enforce policies on certain areas of your project source code tree.

features.name: Improved annotate / blame
features.body: Blame is now more precise than ever and it shows more information like the major contributors to the file and the average line age.

features.name: Java command line client
features.body: A Java-based, fully featured, command-line client has been added to support platforms like HP-UX and AIX.

features.name: Improved cloaked / ignore rules
features.body: The rules to define cloaked.conf, ignored.conf and hidden.conf files are now more flexible and simpler to define.
